name: Slack
description: Slack is a powerful collaboration tool for businesses of all sizes. It brings team communication and collaboration into one place so you can get more work donen8n.io.

name: Gmail
description: Gmail is a free email service offered by Google, used by individuals and organizations to send and receive emails. It remains one of the worldâ€™s most widely used email servicesn8n.io.

name: Google Sheets
description: Google Sheets is a web-based spreadsheet program offered by Google for free, similar to Microsoft Exceln8n.io.

name: Google Calendar
description: Google Calendar is a time-management and calendar service by Google that helps you schedule events and meetings. It is widely used by both individuals and organizationsn8n.io.

name: Google Drive
description: Google Drive is a cloud storage and sync service offered by Google. It allows individuals and organizations to store all types of files in the cloud, sync them across devices, and share them with othersn8n.io.

name: Discord
description: Discord helps groups of people communicate online and share activities together. It is used by communities including gamers and professional teams, allowing voice calls, chats, video streaming, and moren8n.io.

name: PostgreSQL
description: PostgreSQL is a powerful, open-source relational database system known for extensibility and SQL compliancen8n.io.

name: Notion
description: Notion is an all-in-one workspace for teams. It helps team members create tasks, wikis, and databases all in one placen8n.io.

name: Airtable
description: Airtable is a flexible database and spreadsheet tool that helps businesses organize data and workflows. It allows you to interface with new templates and designs, and is trusted by over 300,000 companiesn8n.io.

name: MongoDB
description: MongoDB is a popular document-oriented NoSQL database used for high-performance data storage. It is known for flexibility and ease of scaling for modern appsn8n.io.

name: Microsoft Teams
description: Microsoft Teams helps businesses organize meetings, projects, and collaborations. It offers features such as file storage, video conferencing, screen sharing, and chat messagingn8n.io.

name: Microsoft Outlook
description: Microsoft Outlook is an email and personal information management service offered by Microsoft. It includes email, calendar, task manager, contact manager, and other productivity featuresn8n.io.

name: HubSpot
description: HubSpot is an all-in-one marketing and sales CRM platform tailored for content marketing, SEO, lead management, and marketing automationn8n.io .

name: Twilio
description: Twilio is a cloud communications platform that developers use to send SMS, make and receive phone calls, and integrate other communication channels into applications.

name: SendGrid
description: SendGrid is a cloud-based email delivery and marketing service that helps developers and marketers send transactional and marketing emails at scale.

name: Telegram
description: Telegram is a secure, cloud-based messaging app that lets you send messages and share media. It supports group chats up to 200,000 members and a range of unique featuresn8n.io.

name: Microsoft SQL Server
description: Microsoft SQL Server is a relational database management system developed by Microsoft. Its main function is to store and retrieve data for other applications and it remains one of the most used databases in the worldn8n.io.

name: Jira
description: Jira is a powerful issue and project tracking software developed by Atlassian. It helps teams plan, track, and release software, enabling agile development and project managementn8n.io.

name: Trello
description: Trello is a visual project management tool that uses boards, lists, and cards to help you organize tasks and projects. It is popular for its simplicity and flexibilityn8n.io.

name: ClickUp
description: ClickUp is a comprehensive productivity and project management platform designed to replace multiple workplace apps. It helps teams coordinate tasks, docs, goals, and chats in a unified workspacen8n.io.

name: Google Docs
description: Google Docs is a web-based word processing application part of Google Workspace. It lets multiple users collaborate on documents in real time.

name: Google Slides
description: Google Slides is a presentation program part of Google Workspace, allowing users to create and share slide decks online.

name: Google Contacts
description: Google Contacts is a contact management tool integrated with Google Workspace, allowing users to manage their address book and personal contacts.

name: Google Forms
description: Google Forms is a survey administration and form building tool that is part of Google Workspace, used to create online forms and quizzes.

name: Google Ads
description: Google Ads is an online advertising platform developed by Google, where advertisers bid to display brief advertisements to web users.

name: Salesforce
description: Salesforce is a cloud-based customer relationship management (CRM) platform used by sales and marketing teams to track customer interactions and data.

name: Shopify
description: Shopify is an e-commerce platform that allows businesses to create online stores and sell products. It handles online store management, including payments, inventory, and shipping.

name: Magento
description: Magento is an open-source e-commerce platform owned by Adobe, providing merchants with a flexible shopping cart system and control over their online store's content and functionality.

name: WooCommerce
description: WooCommerce is a customizable, open-source e-commerce plugin for WordPress, allowing businesses to manage an online store within a WordPress site.

name: Stripe
description: Stripe is a payment processing platform for internet businesses, providing APIs to manage online payments and transactions.

name: PayPal
description: PayPal is an online payment platform that enables individuals and businesses to transfer funds electronically over the internet.

name: Dropbox
description: Dropbox is a file hosting service that offers cloud storage, file synchronization, personal cloud, and client software, allowing users to backup and share files online.

name: Box
description: Box is a cloud content management and file sharing service for businesses, providing secure storage and collaboration tools.

name: Zoom
description: Zoom is a video conferencing tool for online meetings, webinars, and communication. It supports video, audio, and chat across multiple devices.

name: Calendly
description: Calendly is a scheduling tool that helps professionals arrange meetings without back-and-forth emails. It automatically detects availability and integrates with calendar apps.

name: Evernote
description: Evernote is a note-taking app that allows users to create, organize, and store notes, lists, and agendas across multiple devices.

name: Asana
description: Asana is a work management platform designed to help teams organize, track, and manage their work and projects.

name: Monday.com
description: Monday.com is a work operating system that powers teams to run projects and workflows with confidence. It provides a centralized platform for planning, tracking, and managing work.

name: Zendesk
description: Zendesk provides a service-first CRM that builds software to meet customer needs, including help desk ticketing and customer service tools.

name: Freshdesk
description: Freshdesk is a cloud-based customer support software that provides helpdesk ticketing, automation, and team collaboration features.

name: Amazon S3
description: Amazon S3 (Simple Storage Service) is a cloud storage service by Amazon Web Services, used widely for storing and retrieving any amount of data at any time.

name: AWS Lambda
description: AWS Lambda is a serverless compute service that runs code in response to events and automatically manages compute resources.

name: AWS SES
description: Amazon Simple Email Service (SES) is a cloud-based email sending service designed to help digital marketers and application developers send marketing, notification, and transactional emails.

name: Cloudflare
description: Cloudflare is a web infrastructure and website security company providing content delivery network services, DDoS mitigation, and Internet security.

name: Amazon DynamoDB
description: DynamoDB is a fully managed NoSQL database service by AWS that provides fast and predictable performance with seamless scalability.

name: Elasticsearch
description: Elasticsearch is a distributed, RESTful search and analytics engine capable of addressing a growing number of use cases.

name: Jira Software
description: Jira Software is an agile project management tool for software development teams, built on the Jira platform by Atlassian.

name: Confluence
description: Confluence is a collaboration wiki tool used to help teams collaborate and share knowledge efficiently.

name: GitLab
description: GitLab is a web-based DevOps lifecycle tool that provides a Git-repository manager with features such as issue tracking, CI/CD pipelines, and code reviews.

name: Bitbucket
description: Bitbucket is a Git repository management solution for professional teams, providing source code hosting and code review.

name: Redmine
description: Redmine is an open-source project management web application written using Ruby on Rails, providing issue tracking and wiki features.

name: Twitter (X)
description: Twitter (now X) is a social networking platform where users post and interact with short messages called tweets.

name: Instagram
description: Instagram is a social media platform for sharing photos and videos, owned by Meta (Facebook).

name: Facebook Pages
description: Facebook Pages integration allows you to automate interactions with Facebook Pages for marketing, posting updates, and data retrieval.

name: Microsoft OneDrive
description: Microsoft OneDrive is a file hosting service and synchronization service operated by Microsoft, allowing users to store files in the cloud and share them.

name: SAP
description: SAP is an enterprise software company that provides business solutions for operations and customer relations, including ERP software.

name: Oracle
description: Oracle provides database software and technology, cloud engineered systems, and enterprise software products â€” notably their own brands of database management systems.

name: Microsoft Azure
description: Microsoft Azure is a cloud computing platform and infrastructure created by Microsoft, providing a range of cloud services including compute, analytics, storage, and networking.

name: Google Analytics
description: Google Analytics is a web analytics service offered by Google that tracks and reports website traffic.

name: QuickBooks Online
description: QuickBooks Online is a cloud-based accounting software for small and medium-sized businesses, managing invoices, expenses, and accounting.

name: Okta
description: Okta is an enterprise identity management service that provides single sign-on, multi-factor authentication, and lifecycle management solutions.

name: Intercom
description: Intercom is a business messaging platform that provides customer service and user engagement tools, such as chatbots and targeted messaging.

name: Jira Service Desk
description: Jira Service Desk (now Jira Service Management) is Atlassianâ€™s IT service management solution for IT and support teams.

name: FreshBooks
description: FreshBooks is a cloud-based accounting software designed for small businesses, offering invoicing, expense tracking, and time tracking.

name: RSS (Feed)
description: RSS is a web feed format used to publish frequently updated works like blogs, news headlines, or podcasts, allowing users to stay updated in one place.

name: Dropbox Paper
description: Dropbox Paper is a collaborative document-editing service that integrates with Dropbox for content creation and organization.

name: BigCommerce
description: BigCommerce is an e-commerce platform for fast-growing and established businesses to build and scale online stores.

name: Salesforce Marketing Cloud
description: Salesforce Marketing Cloud is a digital marketing platform for email, mobile, social, advertising, and web personalization to manage customer engagement.

name: GitHub
description: GitHub is a platform for hosting and collaborating on software development projects using Git. It offers version control, code hosting, and collaboration tools n8n.io.
